title: Please help me...

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So i get this message up when trying to open league...

I have tried restarting my PC and uninstalling and re-installing league and keep getting this result.

I'm on windows 10...

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-13T23:58:34.182+0000)

> I&#039;m on windows 10...

There's your problem

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-08-14T08:58:55.265+0000)
>
> There's your problem

Mac fan?

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-08-14T09:21:19.836+0000)
>
> Mac fan?

No chance, just think Windows 10 is trash

Windows aint really trash, although it is ironic that I'm using a mac to play LoL (which is a minor change on my plays since the keys are mashed up close together) but anyways windows are able to play more variety of games aswell as watching your replays while your in-game

> [{quoted}](name=Chobi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0005000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-15T10:01:53.245+0000)
>
> Windows aint really trash, although it is ironic that I'm using a mac to play LoL (which is a minor change on my plays since the keys are mashed up close together) but anyways windows are able to play more variety of games aswell as watching your replays while your in-game

I'm not saying Windows is bad just Windows 10

Windows 10 is amazing, it's faster, has less problems and better processing and task managing capabilities. I'm guessing you don't use it so you form your opinion based on others.

If it works properly no one will notice it, but if it has a problem people will complain. If you actually do use it and think it's bad, that's your opinion and preference.
But consider that windows 10 has more features, theres been a few bugs and program launch lags that my friend and I encountered. But then again, not all platforms are perfect all.

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-08-14T09:56:15.950+0000)
>
> No chance, just think Windows 10 is trash

Fair enough. I don't hate it atm... there has been worse.
could be getting blocked by anti virus or firewall try checking that out.... maybe add it to a safe list ?

> [{quoted}](name=Best Teemo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-08-14T15:25:22.739+0000)
>
> could be getting blocked by anti virus or firewall try checking that out.... maybe add it to a safe list ?

We got it working :)

Ouch man. Im afraid im a mac user not a windows one so I'm not sure if i can be much help, But on my computer, sometimes it wont open league first time, and to get around it, you keep the program open, but open a second instance of league, and it can override the first one and start up.

Its probably not much help sorry, but at this point I'm sure anything is worth a try.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-14T00:10:26.539+0000)
>
> Ouch man. Im afraid im a mac user not a windows one so I'm not sure if i can be much help, But on my computer, sometimes it wont open league first time, and to get around it, you keep the program open, but open a second instance of league, and it can override the first one and start up.
> 
> Its probably not much help sorry, but at this point I'm sure anything is worth a try.

My friend uses a mac and he also get this issue sometimes. I'm a pc fan boy myself, but sounds like they should be putting a bit more TLC into the mac platform for those that do use it

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-14T00:10:26.539+0000)
>
> Ouch man. Im afraid im a mac user not a windows one so I'm not sure if i can be much help, But on my computer, sometimes it wont open league first time, and to get around it, you keep the program open, but open a second instance of league, and it can override the first one and start up.
> 
> Its probably not much help sorry, but at this point I'm sure anything is worth a try.

Hah worth a shot man but no good ty for trying though :^)
No worries, sorry I'm not a windows tech, i really hope you get it working soon!

I've forwarded this to some Wrenchmen for you! 

In the mean time; try running League as an administrator or in compatibility mode for Windows 7 or 8.

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-14T01:31:07.495+0000)
>
> I've forwarded this to some Wrenchmen for you! 
> 
> In the mean time; try running League as an administrator or in compatibility mode for Windows 7 or 8.

Cheers mate :^)

Hm, if uninstalling and reinstalling didn't work, can you give running League of Legends as an administrator a shot? Run the lol.launcher.admin.exe file in your League of Legends folder and see if the client still crashes. Let me know how that goes!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-14T01:40:05.566+0000)
>
> Hm, if uninstalling and reinstalling didn't work, can you give running League of Legends as an administrator a shot? Run the lol.launcher.admin.exe file in your League of Legends folder and see if the client still crashes. Let me know how that goes!

Worked. thanks heaps :^)
Ctrl+Alt+Delete > Task Manager > Go through the entire list, and close any instances of League > Open League again.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xE6e3uAa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-14T00:42:16.986+0000)
>
> Ctrl+Alt+Delete > Task Manager > Go through the entire list, and close any instances of League > Open League again.

Didn't work either :^(

For starters you should put the topic in the help and support area as a wrenchmen is more likely to see it and is more likely to be a better help

Could be a registry file issue, try running regedit.exe then find league of legend files delete them then reinstall league

type regedit in the search bar, click run command, click ctrl+f in the regedit program, type league of legends, 8 files will come up delete the 4 that have league of legends in the name, should be the 4 bottom ones, do not delete the files with letters and numbers, reinstall league

hope this helps, good luck!
